entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
